Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Liv and I will take care of the dog for the time being, you go train with Commandant, Lucia.', 4: '1'}
{2: "You're going to take care of the puppy too, Lee?", 3: '6', 4: "Thanks, Lee. Let's give it our all, Lucia!", 5: '11'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "It shouldn't be a problem as long as we create a proper procedure for feeding...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Yes, Commandant.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: '...If I were to undergo training, what would it consist of?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Of course it'll include smiling. You're quite expressionless, you know?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Expressionless...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Haven't you noticed? You rarely change your expression. But your emotional expression system should've been turned on long ago with Commandant's permission.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Maybe it was forced closed for too long, resulting in you not being able to outwardly express all the emotions you feel inside now, Lucia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Which gives off the impression of being aloof.', 4: '1'}
{1: '100', 2: 'You know quite a lot, Lee.', 3: '26', 4: "Lucia's actually quite friendly.", 5: '27'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "It shouldn't be hard to reach a conclusion by analyzing our current data.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'But our relationship with you is deeper than with other people.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "So what you're saying is,", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I need to smile, is that right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yep, try smiling.', 3: '32', 4: 'Maybe just try smiling casually?', 5: '33'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I tried to do as Commandant instructed, what do you think?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia... Did you smile?', 3: '37', 4: 'Hm, I had something a bit different in my mind.', 5: '37'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I can deal with an emergency during a mission.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But for smiling, even though I never deleted the data, I still can't figure out how to do it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Maybe this frame just isn't designed to smile.", 4: '1'}
